bug.author: r2d4
bug.summary: [tf-notebook] tf-serving-api package should be pinned to tf version
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/blob/master/components/tensorflow-notebook-image/Dockerfile#L121>https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/blob/master/components/tensorflow-notebook-image/Dockerfile#L121</denchmark-link>
Unpinned, this will grab the latest version of the tensorflow-serving-api package. The version should be parameterized just like the tensorflow package itself (i.e. the tensorflow notebook image for tensorflow 1.6.0 should install tensorflow-serving-api==1.6.0). I believe this is some of the test failures I've seen in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/pull/1786>#1786</denchmark-link>

comments.comment:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/r2d4>@r2d4</denchmark-link> : Closing this issue.
In response to this:
/close
Instructions for interacting with me using PR comments are available here. If you have questions or suggestions related to my behavior, please file an issue against the kubernetes/test-infra repository.
